root.name: Frankenstein: Through the Eyes of the Monster
root.description: OverviewFrankenstein: Through the Eyes of the Monster is a 1995 full-motion video adventure game, developed by Amazing Media and published by Interplay. Tim Curry stars as Dr. Frankenstein, while the player takes the role of Frankenstein's Monster, constructed from the dead tissue of convicted murderer Phillip Werren. The game was released in 1995 for Windows operating systems and Mac, and was released in Europe for the Sega Saturn in 1996.A promotion for the Macintosh version of the game advertised an $8 rebate for owners of Myst.
